column2: Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Site walk over with supervisor and foreperson
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - All services located and marked. Permits issued
Acceptance Criteria - Permits issued and received by qualified staff only
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Check the work pack checklist
Acceptance Criteria - Copy of work pack with all documents
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Apply environmental controls to site.
Acceptance Criteria - Consider drainage, noise, dust, weather.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Cut the existing footpath to the full depth of concrete
Acceptance Criteria - Cut in straight line and regular shape
Verifying Document - Refer to DN- GD-GP145
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Dig out the existing footpath to the required width and make good basecourse. Add 100-200mm either side for boxing.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Subgrade further compacted or excavate the unstable material and replace
Verifying Document - Refer to DN- ZH-FM028.2
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Pegs spaced and timber edging as required.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Use Gap 20 or Sand when preparing the base for concrete Footpaths
Acceptance Criteria - Clegg Hammer value shall not be less than 12 after 4 blows
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - QA results needs to be supplied by supplier
Acceptance Criteria - Minimum Strength of concrete needs to be more than 20MPa
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Check the weather condition, Surface condition before placing concrete , Lightly damped the surface before placing concrete
Acceptance Criteria - Temperature shall not less than 5 degrees Celsius or concrete shall not place in frozen or wet conditions
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Curing period shall not be less than 36 hours
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Berms reinstated with top soil and grass seeded.
Acceptance Criteria - Minimum of 100mm of topsoil and grass seed applied.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Area measured? Water pooling? Any visual crack observed? Photos taken? As-built updated?
Frequency - After the completion of job
